sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WHM_CUST_ITM WHERE 1 = 1 AND CUST_ITM_ID = #cust_itm_id#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WHM_CUST_ITM WHERE 1=1
AND CUST_ITM_ID not in(#cust_itm_id#)
AND ITM_CD = #itm_cd# AND CUST_CD = #cust_cd#
SELECT RGST_OFC_CD from TB_TRDP WHERE 1 = 1 AND TRDP_CD = #cust_cd#

/* WhmItemListSQL.xml > searchItemListRSQL.Query */ SELECT CI.CUST_ITM_ID, CI.CUST_CD, (SELECT TOP 1 TP.LOCL_NM FROM TB_TRDP TP WHERE 1=1 AND TP.TRDP_CD = CI.CUST_CD
) AS CUST_NM, CI.RGST_OFC_CD, CI.ITM_CD, CI.ITM_NM, CI.ITM_HTS_CD, CI.ITM_UT_CD, ISNULL(CI.ITM_INR_QTY, 0) ITM_INR_QTY, ISNULL(CI.ITM_WGT, 0) ITM_WGT, ISNULL(CI.ITM_VOL, 0) ITM_VOL, ISNULL(CI.ITM_WDT, 0) ITM_WDT, ISNULL(CI.ITM_HGT, 0) ITM_HGT, ISNULL(CI.ITM_LEN, 0) ITM_LEN, ISNULL(CI.ITM_PRC_AMT, 0) ITM_PRC_AMT, ISNULL(CI.ITM_WGT_LBS, 0) ITM_WGT_LBS, ISNULL(CI.ITM_VOL_CFT, 0) ITM_VOL_CFT, ISNULL(CI.ITM_WDT_INCH, 0) ITM_WDT_INCH, ISNULL(CI.ITM_HGT_INCH, 0) ITM_HGT_INCH, ISNULL(CI.ITM_LEN_INCH, 0) ITM_LEN_INCH, CI.ITM_CURR_CD, ISNULL(CI.USE_FLG,'N') USE_FLG
FROM WHM_CUST_ITM CI WHERE 1 = 1
FROM WHM_CUST_ITM CI, WHM_SPLR_ITM SI WHERE 1 = 1 AND CI.CUST_ITM_ID = SI.CUST_ITM_ID AND SI.SPLR_CD = #splr_cd#
AND CI.CUST_CD = #cust_cd#
AND CI.USE_FLG = #use_flg#
AND CI.ITM_CD LIKE '%'+#itm_cd# +'%'
AND CI.CUST_ITM_ID LIKE '%'+#cust_itm_id# +'%'
AND CI.ITM_NM LIKE '%'+#itm_nm# +'%'
sqlMap.insert:
/* WhmItemEntrySQL.xml > insertItemEntryRSQL.Query */
INSERT INTO WHM_CUST_ITM ( CUST_ITM_ID, CUST_CD, RGST_OFC_CD, ITM_CD, ITM_NM, ITM_HTS_CD, ITM_UT_CD, ITM_INR_QTY, ITM_WGT, ITM_VOL,
ITM_WDT, ITM_HGT, ITM_LEN, ITM_PRC_AMT, ITM_CURR_CD, USE_FLG, CRE_DT, CRE_USR_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_ID, ITM_WGT_LBS, ITM_VOL_CFT, ITM_WDT_INCH, ITM_HGT_INCH, ITM_LEN_INCH ) VALUES ( #cust_itm_id#, #cust_cd#, #rgst_ofc_cd#, #itm_cd#, #itm_nm#, #itm_hts_cd#, #itm_ut_cd#, #itm_inr_qty#, #itm_wgt#, #itm_vol#,
#itm_wdt#, #itm_hgt#, #itm_len#, #itm_prc_amt#, #itm_curr_cd#, #use_flg#, getdate(), #cre_usr_id#, getdate(), #upd_usr_id#, #itm_wgt_lbs#, #itm_vol_cft#, #itm_wdt_inch#, #itm_hgt_inch#, #itm_len_inch# )
sqlMap.update: /* WhmItemEntrySQL.xml > updateItemEntryUSQL.Query */ UPDATE WHM_CUST_ITM SET CUST_CD = #cust_cd#, RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd#, ITM_CD = #itm_cd#, ITM_NM = #itm_nm#, ITM_HTS_CD = #itm_hts_cd#, ITM_UT_CD = #itm_ut_cd#, ITM_INR_QTY = #itm_inr_qty#, ITM_WGT = #itm_wgt#, ITM_VOL = #itm_vol#, ITM_WDT = #itm_wdt#, ITM_HGT = #itm_hgt#, ITM_LEN = #itm_len#, ITM_PRC_AMT = #itm_prc_amt#, ITM_CURR_CD = #itm_curr_cd#, USE_FLG = #use_flg#, UPD_DT = getdate(), UPD_USR_ID = #upd_usr_id#, ITM_WGT_LBS = #itm_wgt_lbs#, ITM_VOL_CFT = #itm_vol_cft#, ITM_WDT_INCH = #itm_wdt_inch#, ITM_HGT_INCH = #itm_hgt_inch#, ITM_LEN_INCH = #itm_len_inch# WHERE 1 = 1 AND CUST_ITM_ID = #cust_itm_id#
sqlMap.insert: /* WhmItemEntrySQL.xml > insertItemEntrySupplierCSQL.Query */ INSERT INTO WHM_SPLR_ITM ( CUST_ITM_ID, SPLR_CD, RGST_OFC_CD, SPLR_ITM_CD, CRE_DT, CRE_USR_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_ID ) VALUES( #cust_itm_id#, #splr_cd#, #rgst_ofc_cd#, #splr_itm_cd#, getdate(), #cre_usr_id#, getdate(), #upd_usr_id# )
sqlMap.update: /* WhmItemEntrySQL.xml > updateItemEntrySupplierUSQL.Query */ UPDATE WHM_SPLR_ITM SET SPLR_ITM_CD = #splr_itm_cd#, UPD_DT = getdate(), UPD_USR_ID = #upd_usr_id# WHERE 1 = 1 AND CUST_ITM_ID = #cust_itm_id# AND SPLR_CD = #splr_cd# AND RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd#
sqlMap.delete: /* WhmItemEntrySQL.xml > deleteItemEntrySupplierDSQL.Query */ DELETE WHM_SPLR_ITM WHERE 1 = 1 AND CUST_ITM_ID = #cust_itm_id# AND SPLR_CD = #splr_cd# AND RGST_OFC_CD = #rgst_ofc_cd#
sqlMap.select:
/* ITEMSql.xml > searchInfo_Item_byCtrtNo_UnitCd*/
SELECT
( CASE WHEN #unit_cd# = I.PKG_LV1_UNIT_CD THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 0), ISNULL(I.PKG_LV1_QTY,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 2), ISNULL(I.LV1_WIDTH,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 2), ISNULL(I.LV1_LENGTH,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 2), ISNULL(I.LV1_HEIGHT,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM( RTRIM( CONVERT ( DECIMAL (10, 3), ISNULL(I.LV1_GRS_KGS,0) ) ) ) +'|'+ LTRIM( RTRIM( CONVERT (DECIMAL (10, 3), ISNULL(I.LV1_NET_KGS,0) ) ) ) +'|'+ LTRIM( RTRIM( CONVERT (DECIMAL(10, 5), ISNULL(I.LV1_CBM,0)) ) ) WHEN #unit_cd# = I.ITEM_PKGUNIT THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 0), ISNULL(I.ITEM_PKGBASEQTY,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10,2), ISNULL(I.ITEM_WIDTH,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 2), ISNULL(I.ITEM_LENGTH,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 2), ISNULL(I.ITEM_HEIGHT,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM( CONVERT (DECIMAL(10, 3), ISNULL(I.ITEM_KGS,0)) ) ) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM( CONVERT (DECIMAL (10, 3),ISNULL(I.ITEM_NET_WGT,0) ) ) ) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM( CONVERT (DECIMAL(10, 5), ISNULL(I.ITEM_CBM,0)) ) )
WHEN #unit_cd# = I.PKG_LV3_UNIT_CD THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 0), ISNULL(I.PKG_LV3_QTY,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 2), ISNULL(I.LV3_WIDTH,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 2), ISNULL(I.LV3_LENGTH,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 2), ISNULL(I.LV3_HEIGHT,0)))) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM( CONVERT (DECIMAL (10, 3),ISNULL(I.LV3_GRS_KGS,0) ) ) ) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM( CONVERT (DECIMAL (10, 3), ISNULL(I.LV3_NET_KGS,0) ) ) ) +'|'+ LTRIM(RTRIM( CONVERT (DECIMAL(10, 5), ISNULL(I.LV3_CBM,0)) ) )
ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 0), ISNULL(I.PKG_LV4_QTY,0))))
END +'|'+ LEN_UT_CD )AS PKG_LV1_QTY FROM TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM I WHERE I.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# AND I.ITEM_USE_FLG = 'Y' AND I.ITEM_CD = #itm_cd#
